title: Steam Bans CS:GO Accounts With $2 Million Worth of Skins—Do NFTs Fix This?
description: CS:GO accounts tied to at least $2 million worth of assets were just banned—but players could have more options with an NFT game.

title: Report: FTX Management Seeks Investors to Revive Defunct Crypto Exchange; Exchange Token FTT Surges
description: FTX management is actively seeking potential participants to revive the formerly defunct crypto exchange, as reported by sources knowledgeable about the situation. CEO John J. title: Bitcoin remains resilient as President Biden vows to eliminate crypto tax loopholes
description: In a recent speech outlining his economic plan, US President Joe Biden reaffirmed his commitment to making the tax system fairer by eliminating loopholes that allow crypto traders and hedge fund managers to evade taxes. This move addresses an estimated $18 billion in lost tax revenue, signaling the government’s intention to crack down on tax ... Read more

title: Meta Reveals Active Refinements of AI Algorithms for Insta and FB Feeds
description: Meta, the parent company of Instagram and Facebook, has recently provided detailed information about how its artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms determine the content displayed in users’ feeds. title: Fidelity submits renewed application for spot bitcoin ETF
